analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste /

analyzed: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste / bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi dpyod pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: One should cultivate the basis of supernatural power that is concentration of investigation conjoined with the volition of abandoning.

original: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste /

original: bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang pas nges par 'byung bas bdag gi sems @360a *//üîΩnub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o //

translated: By means of the investigation of the specific and the general, one should cultivate the basis of supernatural power that is concentration of mind conjoined with the volition of abandoning.

original: 'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste //

original: 'dod par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o //

original: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par byed de /üîΩrang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba'am /

original: sdig pa de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o //

translated: One does not create any unwholesome karma as a means of livelihood, because one experiences the ripening of that karma, whether it is wholesome or unwholesome.

original: 'di ni dad pa'i dbang por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni dad pa'i dbang por gsungs so //

original: gang zhig chos rnam la dad pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do //
analyzed: gang zhig chos rnam la dad pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do //

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por gsungs so //

analyzed: gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed do //

original: 'di ni dran pa'i dbang por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa'i dbang por gsungs so //
translated: This is called the faculty of mindfulness.

original: gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa'o //

original: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por gsungs so //

original: gang zhig chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi dbang @360b bos so sor rig pa ste /üîΩde ni chos de dang de rnams la so sor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro //

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang por gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang por gsungs so //

analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /

original: bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba /
translated: 1. Liberation through differentiation, 2. liberation through freedom from desire, 3. liberation through cessation, 4. liberation through freedom from defilement,

translated: It is not motivated by the view of annihilation, which denies the existence of a subject of experience. It is not motivated by the view of eternalism. It is not motivated by the view of nihilism. It is not motivated by the view of the creator.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhig tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong pa de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par 'gyur te /

original: 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so //
translated: This is called right thought.üîΩOne should not torment oneself with words, nor should one torment others with words. One should not torment oneself, nor should one torment others.

original: gang zhig tshig gis bdag la gdung par mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang / bdag la nyon mongs par mi bya @361b zhing gzhan dag nyon mongs par mi bya ba dang / bdag la mi dpya zhing gzhan dag la'ang dpya bar mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig tshig gis bdag la gdung par mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang / bdag la nyon mongs par mi bya @361b zhing gzhan dag nyon mongs par mi bya ba dang / bdag la mi dpya zhing gzhan dag la'ang dpya bar mi bya ba ste /

original: de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: gang zhig tshig gis yang dag pa'i 'phags par 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces gsungs so //
translated: That which is right speech is the entrance into the right noble path. This is called right speech.

original: gang zhig las nag po dang / nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar ba dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang /üîΩnag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang / nag po zad pa'i bsam pas gnas pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed de /

translated: One does not create karma that is black and has black karmic maturation. One creates karma that is white and has white karmic maturation.

original: dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste /
translated: One does not create karma that is black and has white karmic maturation. One creates karma that is white and black and has white and black karmic maturation and the intention to exhaust black karma.

original: 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar gsungs so //
translated: This is called right action.üîΩThis is called right action.

original: gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur dul ba dang / yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang / gtam la mi dga' ba dang / rang gi spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur dul ba dang / yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang / gtam la mi dga' ba dang / rang gi spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang /
translated: and has the discipline of one‚Äôs own conduct,üîΩand when one is endowed with the lordship of the next world,üîΩand when one is content with one‚Äôs own wealth that is free of wrongdoing,

original: 'jig rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bka' gnang bas 'tsho ba @362a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bka' gnang bas 'tsho ba @362a *//
translated: and when one lives by the permission of the noble ones,

original: ste; 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so //
analyzed: ste; 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so //
translated: this is called right livelihood.üîΩ‚ÄúEffort is the desire not to followüîΩlies, what is not permitted by the noble ones,

translated: That effort which is applied to the noble truth of the path and leads to nirvana and to the production of one‚Äôs own state is the right effort that follows.

original: 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so //
translated: This is called right effort.

original: gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni rab tu mi g-yo ba dang / lus drang pos kyog po ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing /
analyzed: gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni rab tu mi g-yo ba dang / lus drang pos kyog po ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing /
translated: That which is the basis for that is the right mindfulness that is unshakable, that is not crooked because of the straightness of the body, that is the teaching of mastery over the various faults of cyclic existence, and

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i dran pa ni mi brjed pa /

analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o //

analyzed: 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran par gsungs so //
translated: This is called right mindfulness.

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas te /
